yaml_import.title: ZoneMinder YAML configuration imported
yaml_import.description:
Your ZoneMinder YAML configuration for `{host}` has been automatically imported into a config entry.

Connection settings (host, credentials, SSL) were imported directly. However, platform-level options from `sensor:` and `switch:` YAML blocks (such as `monitored_conditions`, `command_on`, and `command_off`) cannot be imported automatically and have been set to their defaults. Please review the integration options in **Settings → Devices & Services → ZoneMinder → Configure** and adjust as needed.

You can now safely remove all ZoneMinder YAML from your `configuration.yaml`:
- The `zoneminder:` top-level block
- Any `sensor:`, `switch:`, or `camera:` platform entries for `zoneminder`
